article_title: GE Wants to Spawn Industrial Internet Startups
article_text: Security and regulatory concerns have limited health care providers’ use of offshore IT services, but pressure to reduce costs is prompting them to find ways to leverage the offshore model while safeguarding sensitive data.

twitter.description: GE and Frost Data Capital have reached an agreement to incubate 30 or more Industrial Internet startups over the next three years.
twitter.title: GE Wants to Spawn Industrial Internet Startups
